name: Hans-Norbert, the Scientist
description:
Hans-Norbert just started his new job as an assistant microbiologist at the university. Unfortunately, he forgot how to do all the calculations that are necessary for his experiments. Can you help him?

This game was designed as a part of an interactive online seminar. It is directed to students without much lab experience to give them an understanding of how to prepare media and how to create bacterial cultures with correct volumes.

Code and art work by Alex Kraus

Music by Goose Ninja (https://gooseninja.itch.io/)
